story_26_52000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I’m going to be king. Everything I’ve done is for
that purpose.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0200_10:
If I could just become king, I could have everything
that I desire!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Status! Prestige! Power! Loyal Pokémon! Retainers!
Whatever I want!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0400_10: There’s no need for ME to change!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Yes...that’s right. I just need to become king. Then
all will be mine.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Even what “truly matters,” like that kid was
blabbering about...
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Ugh! What am I saying?! I’ve gone and let that
brat get into my head.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0800_10:
All I have to do is become king. That will solve all
my problems.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_0900_10: If I could only become king!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1000_10: Hah! I see you came alone just like I asked!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Ah, there you are. The rude peasant with no
respect for royalty who called me out here.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Let’s battle and get this over with already so I can
take back my Hoopa.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Always Mr. High-and-Mighty, aren’t ya? But for
how long, I wonder.
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Fine! I’m up for a battle! Along with all of my
friends here!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Tsk! I should have known this was nothing more
than a trap!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Of course it’s a trap! What made you think I’d play
fair and battle you one-on-one?
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Get ready! These’re all superstrong Pokémon that
we brought here with a little help from our
pal Hoopa!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_1800_10:
There’s no way you can beat all of us here alone
without your precious retainers!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_2000_10: I can just command three Pokémon at once!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_2100_10: What are you waiting for? Bring it on!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I’ll show you that you pip-squeaks are no match
for me—no matter how many of you there are!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Still playin’ the tough guy, huh? I guess we’ll just
have to knock you down a notch or two!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_2600_10:
How’s it feel to lose to us “pip-squeaks”? Not so
high-and-mighty now, are ya?
story_26_52000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Heh heh heh! All right, Mr. Loser. You’re coming
with us!
story_26_52000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I’m supposed to become...the strongest king
of all...
story_26_52000/2401_1001_3300_10:
OK! Let’s take him back to the hideout before
someone comes looking for him!
